Career Profile

Experienced DevOps Engineer with proficiency in shell scripting, AWS cloud infrastructure, and Python scripting. Seven years of experience in optimizing deployment processes, automating workflows, and enhancing system reliability. Strong problem-solving skills and a dedication to continuous learning. I have dedicated the past seven years to the field of DevOps, streamlining software development, and IT operations. My expertise includes the design and implementation of automated deployment pipelines, ensuring high availability of applications, and minimizing downtime. My contributions have led to increased system efficiency and a more agile development process. My primary career goal is to acquire a comprehensive understanding of cutting-edge DevOps technologies and methodologies. I am committed to continuously expanding my knowledge and skills to stay at the forefront of this dynamic field. Additionally, I aim to leverage my expertise to help organizations enhance their software delivery processes, reduce operational overhead, and achieve higher levels of reliability and scalability.

Field Engineer

2016 - 2019
Space Hellas, Greece

Started my position in Space Hellas participating in large IT projects including fixing problems in IT equipment in large organizations. Worked on CCTV, alarm systems and physical security. Finally, started working with network devices, mainly Cisco, configuring new devices and troubleshooting existing networks. Participated in large projects for TAP, HTO and multiple banking organizations.
